snippet: The staff changes, including the departure of the president of Walmart.com, come as the company shifts toward a stronger online presence.
abstract: Walmart announces that its website president Joel Anderson is resigning; says Fernando Madeira is promoted at division; company is shifting toward stronger online presence.
lead_paragraph: The staff changes, including the departure of the president of Walmart.com, come as the company shifts toward a stronger online presence.

headline.print_headline: Reorganization at Walmart in E-Commerce Personnel
